text: Without honour, you've got no family.
You don't turn your back on family, even when they do.
You will always be with me, and you will always be my brother.
The most important thing to me will always be the people in this room - my family.
[[b]]Fraternity[[/b]] can be increased by winning battles, enemy casualities, and family members in faction.
[[b]]Fraternity[[/b]] can be decreased by losing battles, friendly casualities, and non-family members in faction.
I don't have friends. I have family.
• Boosts morale and damage for armies
